name: @jupyterlab/nbwidgets
description: The JupyterLab extension providing Jupyter widgets.

scripts.clean: rimraf docs && rimraf lib && rimraf jupyterlab_widgets/static
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:extension
scripts.update: rimraf node_modules/jupyter-js-widgets; npm install file:../jupyter-js-widgets; npm run build
scripts.docs: typedoc --mode file --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --target es5 --moduleResolution node --out docs/ src

author: Project Jupyter
